task.title: Registering for Optional Schedule Items
task.abstract: An event generally offers various activities for attendees. In order to participate, attendees must register for the individual activity prior to the Registration End Date, or register for a package item, if available. Registration for optional schedule items exists to accommodate those participating in multiple activities over the course of a single event.

taskbody.prereq:
Prerequisites: Prior to registering for optional schedule items, the following must be created:
An event
A ticket type
A schedule item
See and proceed through the first two steps.

step.cmd: Click the Shopping Cart button on the Sales Order Detail page.
Select the Events checkbox in the Filter Results sidebar. Search for the schedule item and add it to the Shopping Cart.
Click the Interview tab. Check the box next to each event session to add it to the Shopping Cart. Click Add to Cart.

info.p: If there is a scheduling conflict between selected schedule items, staff users not assigned an Administrator user profile will receive notification via popup window.

step.cmd: Review the field values in the Price and Quantity tab and click the Save button to preserve any changes. Otherwise, click the Checkout button.
step.info: Administrators can select the Price Override checkbox to manually enter a value in the Sales Price field.

step.cmd: Select the correct payment gateway and complete the required payment information. Click the Pay button.

taskbody.result: Event registration for optional schedule items is successfully completed via the Shopping Cart upon payment.
